summary: Project moving from draft/staging state toward publishing live.
architectural_notes: Define/execute a production publish process (build + deploy to live).

existing_features.title: Add/adjust frontend environment configuration files/documentation so it is straightforward to publish live (e.g., provide a live env configuration alongside the existing draft env configuration) without requiring code changes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish the current build live (production release)

Switch the frontend publishing configuration from Draft Mode to Live Mode for the production build by setting the publishing environment variable to live (VITE_PUBLISHING_STATE=live) and ensuring draft-only UI elements are not shown.
Ensure the robots meta policy behaves correctly in Live Mode so search engines can index the site: in live mode set robots to "index, follow"; in draft/maintenance set robots to "noindex, nofollow".

projectName: Publish the app in live mode (production)
